bug.author: happyjin
bug.summary: RuntimeError when I run the default run.sh on stage 5
bug.description:
I try to run default run.sh of HKUST Chinese dataset. During stage 5, there is RuntimeError in the code of e2e_asr_transformer.py. The code piece which trigger this error is as below: <denchmark-code>local_best_scores, joint_best_ids = torch.topk( local_scores, beam, dim=1) </denchmark-code>
Here is the bug details: <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/jinli/projects/espnet/egs/hkust/asr1/../../../espnet/bin/asr_recog.py", line 327, in <module> main(sys.argv[1:]) File "/home/jinli/projects/espnet/egs/hkust/asr1/../../../espnet/bin/asr_recog.py", line 305, in main recog(args) File "/home/jinli/projects/espnet/espnet/asr/pytorch_backend/asr.py", line 1034, in recog feat, args, train_args.char_list, rnnlm File "/home/jinli/projects/espnet/espnet/nets/pytorch_backend/e2e_asr_transformer.py", line 549, in recognize local_scores, beam, dim=1 RuntimeError: selected index k out of range </denchmark-code>
Then I print the local_scores.shape which returns torch.Size([1, 6]). However, the beam=10 which means the shape of local_scores is less than beam. Could you guys please help me, how can I fix this bug? Thanks in advance!
